website_summaries.verdict: Those looking to indulge their princess-lifestyle fantasies with fun colors and an elegant shape will find their match in this whimsical canopy.
pros: Comes in three "princess style" colors perfect for children and imaginative adults
Hangs by one hook and covers an entire twin bed, but also works well with full-sized and queen beds
Customers admire the ribbons crafted into the canopy
cons: Comes wrinkly, but that's an easy fix with an iron
Some buyers wish there was more lace embellishment

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a Princess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this canopy for my four year old grand daughter so that she could have a princess bed. After painting the bed purple, I glued multi-colored organza butterflies to the canopy and hung it from the ceiling. It attached easily with one hook. She absolutely loved it! The price is very reasonable. The color was a bit more pink than the picture shown, but that was a plus for me. I cannot yet attest as to how it will hold up, but I am very pleased with the purchase and would recommend it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: That was not great, but the real problem is that the support ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a repeat purchase to replace a damaged item thanks to our cat. However, the product shipped was not the product in the picture; there was no solid part in the center this time. That was not great, but the real problem is that the support bars in the top of the canopy which should hold the top taught and which cross in the middle no longer do so and move to become parallel.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Gift to granddaughter who loved it.Good quality. Still over bed since Christmas 2015
customer_reviews.author: Mariecat B.

customer_reviews.title: my girls were delighted
customer_reviews.text: My girls (7 and 4) wanted a princess canopy for their bed. I found this one and hung it over the head of the bed -- it sticks out 36". It hangs from a hook, so it does move and it can be pulled by girls playing in the netting. We swept the netting back and looped it around the corner of the bed. I was going to tie it with ribbon, but the netting is a solid piece all the way around except for an opening in the front. I intend to make a little slit for tying the ribbon. It is pretty and they were delighted when we surprised them.
customer_reviews.author: love being a mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks incredible lovely product
customer_reviews.text: This is being used above my 3 year old daughter bed. It looks beautiful she loves it, but unfortunately our kitten liked it too. Unfortunately the kitten tore the fabric, but other than that I believe that it would have remained intact otherwise. Lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Of Two Minds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my oldest daughter(8) for christmas and she absolutely loved it. She loves how it looks, how it feels, she loves to play in it and it makes her feel like a princess. Which was the point....but within seconds of hanging it up the ribbon popped and the polls fell so I had to sew it all back together. It seems a little bit cheap when you set it up, but I guess for the price you can't complain too much. It does what it is supposed to do and my daughter loves it, but I wish it had been put together a little nicer maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: not like it looks in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and calls it her “princess castle bed,” but it is kind of droopy, not like it looks in the pictures. It serves its purpose though. The netting has held up well with my kids getting in and out daily (and playing in it). I do love the lace around the opening!
customer_reviews.author: Jthom12

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves the princess feel
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old daughter. Love it, but the tent like set up on the top.. well the ribbon holding the tent poles ripped out only a few days after having it. So the poles dangle down low and they will not stay at the top. I guess my wife will either need to pen the ribbon back up with a pen or sew it back up there with double stitching.
customer_reviews.author: clint brown

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty but very challenging to put together
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being too big for my daughter's room (not the seller's fault). It's pretty but very challenging to put together. Seller accepted the return with no issues, so kudos to them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves it! The canopy top is nice as it holds the netting further towards the edge of the bed keeping it more open and out of the way. Thus preventing getting tangled in the netting.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: So very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect, adorable and pretty darn cheap compared to everything else I saw. My daughter and I both loved it in her room. However, being the proud owners (maybe not at that moment) of two lovely (but playful) cats, it was soon demolished. However, we loved the product so much we might buy it later in the future if still available. (When our cats aren't so energetic!)
customer_reviews.author: Luba

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and 10 yr old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and 10 yr old daughter loves it. Can be used on regular bed without poles, as top structure is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: BIG but really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected, but its beautiful and i'm sure will add allot of flare to my daughters "big girl room" , easy to set up.. didn't come with the best instructions .. but is pretty straight forward so i didn't need them. excited to start getting my daughters room set up when we move!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like the picture shown!
customer_reviews.text: Does not look like the picture! I was looking for something like this and when I saw this one pictured, and I ordered it immediately! I was disappointed in the quality and it looks nothing like what is pictured!
customer_reviews.author: PK Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughters have these over their beds and they love them! So pink and perfectly princess-y
customer_reviews.text: Both of my daughters have these over their beds and they love them! So pink and perfectly princess-y! Although the canopy is smaller than a standard size twin bed, the drape covers it just fine. There are some small tears in the mesh after two years of in and out, but overall it has held up beautifully. I appreciate that it's shipped with a hook for installation. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia H

customer_reviews.title: The fabric was like mosquito net instead of sheer with lace
customer_reviews.text: This item was not as pictured. Returned it. The fabric was like mosquito net instead of sheer with lace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: princess for the grand baby
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Awesome Awesome She loved her room and it was a surprise!
customer_reviews.author: sandra hayward

customer_reviews.title: this canopy is what she loves best. It has held up perfectly (at three weeks) ...
customer_reviews.text: We just bought our six-year old brand-new everything in her room; this canopy is what she loves best. It has held up perfectly (at three weeks) being used by her and her three-year-old brother. The hanging triangle on top is black plastic, but we covered that up with some excess ribbons. The inside has the tubes that give the canopy its shape exposed to view. Despite these very small aesthetic things, the canopy was a great sturdy buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cece Castille

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Adorable, Cute....Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I purchased this and I'm so glad I did! This canopy fits perfect over my daughter's twin bed and she absolutely loves it! No more sleeping with mom and dad bc she loves her own bed so much! It was the perfect addition to her room and it seems like its pretty durable. It doesn't look or feel cheap, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that we only had to put a small screw in the ceiling to hang it. For beautifully over her full size bed. It was hard to see in the pictures but there is only one opening. So pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my seven year old as a Christmas preset. I hung it Christmas Eve and added some silver and gold bows to the top since these are the colors she wants for her room. This was her favorite present of the year. It was easy to put together and very easy to hang. Beautiful when it is up and makes any girl feel like a princess. Would not recommend for a small room as the top is very big.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth barnes

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: The photo and what I received are different. The product picture has lace on the edge of the opening, mine did not .The material in the picture looks similar to cheese cloth material vs mine looks and feels more like small holed fish net. The canopy section looks good and no problem with set up.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Cute for a little princess
customer_reviews.text: If you have a "girly" little girl then get this. I simply hung this over my daughter's bed and she was so happy. It lasts and is a brighter pink than shown.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Coach

customer_reviews.title: Attached Nylon Glitter Butterflies with a hot glue gun and it looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Hung over a twin bunk bed and it fit perfectly end to end and all the way to the floor. Attached Nylon Glitter Butterflies with a hot glue gun and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Losch

customer_reviews.title: Picture does NOT match actualy product!
customer_reviews.text: Beware - it is NOT open except in the front - so if you want other openings, but prepared to sow the edges of mosquito netting - not fun! Does not match the photo for openings!!! Called the manufacturer and they said "Most only have one opening"
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughters room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this canopy. It was pretty self explanatory to put together and took no time at all but there is no instructions on the best way to hang it. I went to the store and found something that I thought would work and finally got it put up. If you want to pull it back on the side that opens you need to buy something (we used clip on butterflies) to use. Other than that its fabulous and every princess should have one!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ready

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very large
customer_reviews.text: I think this is adorable and my 6 year old loves it but I didn't plan on it being as big as it is. It is larger than the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Momma3

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as picture
customer_reviews.text: The canopy we received was just ok. It is definitely not the one in the picture. The one that we received came with instructions that did not fit the actual product. It did have the lace on the one side like the one in the picture.The worst part is that the poles fit into the top side of the canopy so they poke up above so you can see them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Enger

customer_reviews.title: For the Princess
customer_reviews.text: She absolutely loves the canopy! She even helped putting it up! She loves showing off her room with her beautiful canopy!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print.
customer_reviews.text: Canopy arrived and it was too big for the space that I needed it and so I wanted to exhange it but the return policy is only 30 days from the date it SHIPS so by the time it arrived at my door I had only a 2 week window to return it. Read the fine print.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 7th birthday & she absolutely loves it. It looks beautiful above her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The canopy is very cute! The only reason I gave it 3 stars is because when I assembled it one of the poles immediately poked through the pocket so I will have to repair. Also, I thought it would have openings on bothe of the longer sides but only has an opening on one side so really only good for a day bed. It does not come with instructions so you have to look at the pictures on amazon to see it. Other than that I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Luuuuuke

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install,looks great in the princess' room and best of all, she loves it! So much in fact, she is less trouble getting to bed. She says "now I am a real princess! Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Good Girl "Viv"

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: so beautiful I love how it looks and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I like this tent. It's sturdy and beautiful. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it doesn't quite have the luster like the picture makes it seem.
customer_reviews.author: O. Salami

customer_reviews.title: makes her feel like a princess
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old daughter loves this, makes her feel like a princess. Very easy to put together and hang, no problems. I saw posts that it had a smell when opened package and it did not for me. I hung out for a day or two to fall and no ironing needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wrong color received!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in purple lilac, received a white one, double checked my order through amazon, even the title said purple canopy, so beware you may not receive this in color you ordered!
customer_reviews.author: jasi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves this. The color is a lot lighter then the picture
customer_reviews.author: Sean Moats

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a real princess when I sleep in my princess ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a real princess when I sleep in my princess bed! Actually, my grandaughter loves it! It was easy to assemble, and my princess says it is even better than the one at her little girlfriends house. Once again, I am the best grampa!!! Thanks for a quality product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack E. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Instant Canopy!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was skeptic at first by the low price...but this is a very nice accent to any girls room. You simply can't go wrong with the affect it creates...and my daughter loves it! Good Deal!
customer_reviews.author: Julius Trammer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect over daybed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's bed. She has a toddler daybed and it fits nicely around the bed and opens in the front. The only thing missing is something to hold back the openings, I had to use small, unnoticeable hair clips to hold it back. Overall, it is a great canopy and looks beautiful in my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved it and always asks me where I got it from. My daughter loves to mess with it so I have to keep my eye on her.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Lovely canopy, great price!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE our new canopy. Bought this for our 4 yr. old daughter when she got her new "Big Girl" bed. Now she REALLY thinks she IS a princess! It is lovely, easy to assemble and a bargain for the price! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Eubank

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: The canopy arrived very quickly. It looked just like the picture. It was very easy to put together, except we had to go online to get the directions on how to assemble it. None were included. I would have rated it 5 stars if directions had been in the box. Very good price and my granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Good rating. Partially satisfied because the item was delivered ...
customer_reviews.text: Good rating. Partially satisfied because the item was delivered in a timely manner, the fabric is good, my daughter loves it. Problem: 4 out of six poles were missing from the package. I'm working on that now
customer_reviews.author: diana estwick

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive all the rods it was supposed to come with. With out those it won't hang up. Not worth it if your not gonna get all the parts to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: This canopy was very pretty and easy to put together. It wasn't exactly like it was in the photo though. It was a small -net like fabrica and it had this pretty lace stuff. it works really nice. It can fit any size of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Horspool

customer_reviews.title: Totally princess
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to create a princess room for my grand-daughter. I love this canopy and so does she. Very easy to install into the ceiling, all parts included. Great buy for the money. I say 100% buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Second time buying this 1st one was in pink.
customer_reviews.author: tamellah

customer_reviews.title: great little girls canopy
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing canopy for the price. My daughter got it for her Birthday, and was thrilled, all her friends can't wait to climb under it when they come over. It is HUGE..I want one for myself. I did add some purple tulle to the bows all along it, and it looks extremely expensive, best purchase on Amazon ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: From the picture I thought the drapes was made out of the same material as the top of the canopy but it is actually tulle. A little disappointed but not terribly. I only gave it four stars because if I tie the poles to the center then the canopy is unbalanced so somehow the center ribbon is off. Otherwise happy.
customer_reviews.author: hmomg

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. Exactly as pictured. Only 1 small issue for me personally was that it swings a bit so can turn to be crooked over the bed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bovell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!.
customer_reviews.text: This has added so much to my daughter's bedroom decor. She truly feels like a princess and so do her friends when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted for my great granddaugthers room it is just beautiful, made real well and very easy to put together and hang, if your thinking about it STOP just get it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Edwards

customer_reviews.title: This net is a simple big net to last for a couple of years
customer_reviews.text: The purple color was a lot lighter than it looks in the picture. Material was not great but not bad. The net is big enough to cover the whole full size bed. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Le

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality of material, nothing like what is in the picture. It was easy to install and large enough for a queen or king size bed. The manufacture's concept was good they should've choose a better quality for the material.
customer_reviews.author: Annisha Creary

customer_reviews.title: Hang It Up and You're Done
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loved this. She's outgrown it now, but I just recently used it for a photography background and it it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Canopy for my Grandson's playroom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use in a playroom I was making for my Grandson. It is perfect. It workks great for boy's too.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Hanni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, only one open side
customer_reviews.text: The color was a beautiful lilac, the size was as expected. Only one side opens, just a heads up. If I had read all of the reviews more thoroughly (and on some of the other colors) I would have realized this, but this wasn't a big deal for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: blondefae

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put up and it looks great over my daughter's twin bed. She loves sleeping in her "princess" bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zeafla

customer_reviews.title: not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this for my daughters crib. it looks really pretty but i thought it was going to be little jewels sewn all over. it's not. zoom in and look closely. i wished i could zoom in more i might not have purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: 1mommy

customer_reviews.title: pink canopy
customer_reviews.text: best price found online, delivered on time, easy to assemble, fits great around double bed, can be moved easily to a different place, mommy and daughter very happy
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Pink World
customer_reviews.text: Love this pink shimmery canopy, and best of all my daughter loves it! So pink and shipping on this product was fast and there was no issues. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Edicsa

customer_reviews.title: very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: beautiful canopy enhancesthe beauty ofmy daughters crib. Item arrived ahead of time very impressive compared to the expected arrival date....
customer_reviews.author: kmatthews39440

customer_reviews.title: canopy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, adorable canopy. My granddaughter was very happy when she received it and I am very happy with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: sumo68

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a "princess" bed so I found this canopy on amazon. She loves it! Very easy to put together and very well made. The only thing in my daughter's room that didn't work out very well was the room was too small. We have a fan in the middle of the ceiling so I had to put her full bed in the corner to accommodate the large canopy. We made it work but I would suggest taking all measurements and planning out the room before ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Mom with Twins

customer_reviews.title: directions
customer_reviews.text: We just got ours today and haven't put it together yet but so far it looks good. Only problem is there are no instructions.....can anyone help? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Kaczmarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wanting a princess room and now she has one! Great canopy. Super easy to hang. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Abbysmom

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The item received was defective as a couple of the loops were sewn together and it was dirty. Since it was a gift, I didn't realize this until after the 30 day return period and was unable to return the item. The company did send a replacement which I have not yet received. It is not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect princess canopy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this due to the great reviews and my daughter is enjoying it greatly. It came quickly in a small shipping box and was very easy to put together, 2-3 minutes. It even came with a hanging hook to install into the ceiling. It was a bit crumpled from shipping, but I just steamed it and it looks great. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking to make a "princess bed" for minimal cost.
customer_reviews.author: jennyo

customer_reviews.title: Princess canopy
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. My only complaint is that the ties come apart and I haven't figured out how to tie them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The canopy is missing 2 bars so we are unable to set it up. I'm completely unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Review Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Item changed
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was not what I ordered. Am keeping the canopy because my daughter loves it but I will not order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Forgot to stitch in one corner
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the maker forgot to stitch one pocket into the corner in order to assemble this. Very dissappointed that my child had to wait for me to come up with a solution in order to get this thing hanging up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great princess canopy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this canopy for my 5 years old daughter and she likes it very much. Shipping is very fast and the product is much better than my expectation. The color is light pink and the size is perfect for her full bed. Strongly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: lyan

customer_reviews.title: pretty as a princess
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her canopy! It's a little overpriced for the quality, but my daughter feels like a princess under it so it's worth it. It's mesh netting kind of like mosquitto netting. The top is put together with pole like a tent and covers almost an entire twin size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: because the quanlity is so bad.
customer_reviews.text: I think I have returned this one, because the quanlity is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Princess Bed Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Received them in a most timely manner, however canopies are not the same as in the photo.. no lace. I am highly disappointed in the fact they do not appear as shown in the photo. It is merely a bed canopy with no lace
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Cox Gerlofs

customer_reviews.title: Still not delivered
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this through new Amazon Prime account. Vendor sent it through UPS, who then turned it over to USPS, who then claimed a delivery. Except we were all home on a snow day, which is a little hard to dispute. Two hours later, still on hold with USPS to get the package redelivered? Why, you ask, must a person go through all this for a $30 piece of material? Because the vendor sent the package with a requirement for a signature. Just plain stupid and horribly inconvenient. Unless you will be waiting at the door for this item, choose someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Outside in PA

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: its hard to keep up straight, it gets tangled all over you while your sleeping, and it doesn't look asnice hanging in your house as it does in the picture. Also, the ties come untied.
customer_reviews.author: Kellee Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Canopy Cover
customer_reviews.text: it is nice but just so you know it does not fit the princess bed. it would be nice if you didn't have a canopy bed.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: We love this canopy!
customer_reviews.text: This canopy looks exactly like it does in the photos. My 8-year-old daughter loves it! Her room doesn't really have the space for a big canopy bed, so this is a wonderful, cost-effective alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Girlies' Momma

customer_reviews.title: picture misleading!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all ~ arrived in a plastic bag inside a ups box but when I took it out to unwrap it, one side of ribbon and mesh was gray and filthy!!! The point was to have a pure white brand new clean item, especially when paying more for rushed shipping. AND the blue/white photo used for the product is NOT what it looks like! There is NO LACE EDGING at the opening! and in this photo it looks like the top is satin and shinny, not camping tent nylon. The product matches the price. Should have gone with a 4-point casablanca canopy instead.
customer_reviews.author: JenC71

customer_reviews.title: mis-advertise
customer_reviews.text: when i order this item it was suppose to be the pink ruffle canopy, once it arrive it looked nothing like what i ordered!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: not exactly what the photo looks like
customer_reviews.text: The product I received seems somewhat of a knock off version of this canopy. The top of it looks nothing like the photo. Everything is mesh including the top area which I thought was fabric. It is sturdy and durable but it's definitely another version than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: christinac6

customer_reviews.title: Recived Used Item Paid For New One
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissapointed when I opened the box and saw that the product I was sent had been previously used. It had hairs and threads all over the canopy. The fixtures were dirty. I ordered a white canopy so dirt was easily seen. I would have not bought this item if I had known this is what I would have received. Bad business. I am one UNHAPPY CUSTOMER.
customer_reviews.author: Calisweetheart

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but hard
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited when we bought it. Though it never went up. It doesn't come with directions or a picture. Very hard to assemble. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jackell

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for returned items that get shipped to you.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas Gift, so I have yet to get it up and installed. I am leaving three stars because the package I got - which is the same product as the purple version I purchased too - came in a package that was an OBVIOUS RETURN. The other package was new and pretty and actually says what it is. This was wrapped up like junk. If something goes wrong with this, I will be sure to come back and rate it lower. Right now through, this is the best I can give it.
customer_reviews.author: A Wife, Mom, JediTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful! The netting is sheer and delicate - just lovely. I love that you can have it fully enclosed or parted on one side so she can easily get in and out of bed. I have it over a toddler daybed, and it is just great. Little brother has been tugging on it quite vigorously playing peek-a-boo, and there have been no issues. It is durable and easy to set up. LOVE IT! 5 stars. (it is true that there is no lace trim on the product, but still lovely for a great price and otherwise true to photo)
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Not like picture
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for the functionality of it- to keep the skeeters out. Worked great over our queen bed (why I gave it better than 1 star). We just hung it closer towards the top. I gave it 3 stars (instead of 4) because it is not the same as the picture. ANNOYING. We hoped to be able to tie it up using the long ribbon used to tie the bows in the picture. The one shown is what we received for our daughter two yrs ago. What we received this time has lace around the edge without the scallops or ribbon. Also, the satin top had some black smudges that look like permanent marker. Kinda overpriced for quality.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiM09

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made big cannopy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely made bed canopy. It has a plastic lightweight frame at the top similar to tent poles. Easy to put together, hangs from a single anchored hook and My little girl loved it. A good easy way to give your little princess a canopy bed since it's very easy to hang up or take down when she no longer a wants to be a princess. It has a large rectangle open area above the bed That I like that better than some of the smaller round top canopys, it felt less closed in the others.
customer_reviews.author: Bonvie family

customer_reviews.title: More Mosquito Net, Less Canopy
customer_reviews.text: The material is very synthetic-feeling. Not a very feminine fabric. This is more like a decorative mosquito netting. It is also very long. When hung from a ceiling hook in our playroom, it drags several inches(possibly a foot) on the floor and our ceilings are 7 ft high. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: A question was asked if the material is sheer or ...
customer_reviews.text: A question was asked if the material is sheer or mosquito netting....answer was "sheer". It is not sheer. I received the canopy and on the package it states MOSQUITO NET. The picture should be changed. Sheer material has a luster tomit as the picture shows whereas mosquito netting does not.
customer_reviews.author: Ju -Po

customer_reviews.title: Just what we hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I am just thrilled with this canopy. I was worried after reading the previous reviews, but the seller took care of everything. The product came in the mail very quickly, with directions and only took us about 5 minutes to assemble. I purchased this for my daughter's room and she just thinks it is the neatest thing. It is large- but that is what I wanted. She sleeps in a full bed, and the size of this canopy covers all edges of the bed- with very little stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Meg

customer_reviews.title: Very big and nice canopy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my six year old daughter. It fits her twin bed perfectly. I would not recommend this for a full sized bed as I don't think it would fit. The only set back I had was I had to find an extra long string to hang it from as my ceilings are 12' high and it came about a foot off the ground using the string that came with it. It was very easy to put together. Everything came with it and I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was way bigger than most canopy offers. It covers her whole queen bed. It is very thin sheer so if your child is rough then it will get ripped quick. After having for quite a few months I give it a thumps up. You may want to get your own anchor for hanging from the ceiling. I bought a toggle style that was more decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is like netting rather than organza and there is no lace ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not hung it yet but it is not as pictured. The fabric is like netting rather than organza and there is no lace anywhere. Going to see if it works but not very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Item OK - appreciate the customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in a timely manner. Unfortunately we could not assemble it due to parts left off by the manufacturer. The positive is that the reseller ended up reimbursing us for the item w/o hassle so I appreciate the customer service. Would have been cute if we could have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Stietenroth

customer_reviews.title: bed canopy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pink canopy that goes well with my 11 year old daughter's new room decor. She loves the canopy and uses it as a "secret" tent (although of course you can see right through it) and plays inside it often. Lovely draped over the headboard of her bed.
customer_reviews.author: furie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big!
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest hanging canopy I have seen. It is large enough to completely cover a crib or toddler size bed. It is even large enough to cover a twin size bed with the fabric draped out! My princess calls this her "fort." It is a nice shade of pink and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tigermom

product_meta.title: Four Corner Rectangle Princess Bed Canopy by Sid (White)
product_meta.description: Color:White100% POLYESTER BRAND NEW TWIN - FULL SIZE BED CANOPY THIS CANOPY IS HUGE! MEASURES 39'' x 74'' AT THE TOP TO OVER 8' DOWN. FITS MOST ANY BED! MEASURES 39''x74''x96'' THIS ITEM IS PERFECT FOR ANY CHILD ROOM ITS GREAT FOR SPRING AND SUMMERTIME FUN THE WITH LACE AND ACCENTS AS SHOWN - WOULD LOOK GREAT IN CHILD, TEEN, ADULT OR BABY ROOM FITS ALL SIZE BEDS FROM TWIN TO KING WOULD FIT OVER A CRIB USE IT BACKYARD OR USE IT IN CORNER OF A ROOM WITH PILLOWS FOR A GREAT ACCENT AREA.
feature_bullets: TURN ANY BED INTO A CANOPY BED

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars231 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
